title: Mayil Iragae Song Lyrics Anbe Aaruyire
stanzas:
Mayil iragae mayil irage
varudukiraai mella
malai nilave malai nilave
vizhiyil ellaam un ulaa

uyirai thodarndhu varum
neethaane meiyyezhuthu
naan podum kaiezhuthu
anbae.

ulaga mozhiyil varum
ellaame neerazhuthu
kadhal thaan kallezhuthu
anbae..

Mayil Iragaai mayil iragaai
varudugiraai mella.
malai nilave malai nilave
vizhiyil ellaam un ulaa

Madurai podhiyai marandhu
un madiyinil paaindhadhu vaigai
medhuvaa medhuvaa medhuvaa
indha vaigaiyil vaithidu kai

podhigai malaiyai pirindhu
un paarvayil neendhudhu thendral
adhai naan adhai nan pidithu
mella adaithaen mana siraiyil

or ilakkiyam nam kadhal
vaan ulla varai
vaazhum paadal.

Mayil Iragaai mayil iragaai
varudugiraai mella.
malai nilave malai nilave
vizhiyil ellaam un ulaa

uyirai thodarndhu varum
neethaane meiyyezhuthu
naan podum kaiezhuthu
anbae.

ulaga mozhiyil varum
ellaame neerazhuthu
kadhal thaan kallezhuthu
anbae..

Tamizha tamizha tamizha
un tamizh ingu selaiyil varudhaa
amizhdhaai amizhdhaai amizhdhaai
kavi aathida nee varuvaai

ondraa irandaai moondraai
andha valluvan kandadhu muppaal
unakum enakum viruppam
andha moondraam paal allavaa

Mayil iragae mayil irage
varudukiraai mella
malai nilave malai nilave
vizhiyil ellaam un ulaa

uyirai thodarndhu varum
neethaane meiyyezhuthu
naan podum kaiezhuthu
anbae.

ulaga mozhiyil varum
ellaame neerazhuthu
kadhal thaan kallezhuthu
anbae..

Mayil Iragaai mayil iragaai
varudugiraai mella.
malai nilave malai nilave
vizhiyil ellaam un ulaa

seo.title: Mayil Iragae Song Lyrics Anbe Aaruyire
seo.description: Get the complete Mayil Iragae Song Lyrics Anbe Aaruyire from Anbe Aaruyire. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Madhusree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, Anbe Aaruyire, AR Rahman, Madhusree, Naresh Iyer, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
